verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H0853"\w* end, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* servant \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* himself.

\w The|strong="H2388"\w* unjust hath said within \w himself|strong="H2388"\w*, \w that|strong="H6965"\w* he would sin: there \w is|strong="H4043"\w* no fear \w of|strong="H4043"\w* God before \w his|strong="H2388"\w* eyes.

\w For|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w his|strong="H7291"\w* sight \w he|strong="H0559"\w* hath done deceitfully, \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H7291"\w* iniquity \w may|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* found unto hatred.

\w The|strong="H1245"\w* words \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w his|strong="H1245"\w* \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w* \w are|strong="H5315"\w* iniquity \w and|strong="H0954"\w* guile: \w he|strong="H2803"\w* \w would|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H5315"\w* understand \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w he|strong="H2803"\w* might do well.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* hath devised iniquity \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* bed, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hath set \w himself|strong="H6440"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* every \w way|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* good: \w but|strong="H1961"\w* evil \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w not|strong="H1961"\w* hated.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, thy \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* heaven, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy truth reacheth, even \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* clouds.

Thy justice \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* mountains \w of|strong="H5315"\w* God, thy judgments \w are|strong="H5315"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* great deep. Men \w and|strong="H5315"\w* beasts thou wilt preserve, \w O|strong="H5315"\w* Lord:

O \w how|strong="H0834"\w* hast thou multiplied thy mercy, O \w God|strong="H3808"\w*! \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* children \w of|strong="H0935"\w* men \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H0935"\w* trust \w under|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* covert \w of|strong="H0935"\w* thy wings.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* inebriated \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* plenty \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy house; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt make \w them|strong="H3068"\w* drink \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* torrent \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy pleasure.

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* thee \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fountain \w of|strong="H3068"\w* life; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thy light \w we|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* see light.

Extend thy mercy \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w them|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* thy justice \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w them|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* right \w in|strong="H6965"\w* heart.

\w Let|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w foot|strong="H8478"\w* \w of|strong="H8478"\w* pride come \w to|strong="H5315"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w let|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* hand \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* sinner move \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w There|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* workers \w of|strong="H5921"\w* iniquity \w are|strong="H5315"\w* fallen, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H5315"\w* cast \w out|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* could \w not|strong="H5315"\w* stand.
